overview: Concert Recorded in 2005 in the Harmonie Club  Bonn Germany  Pure is a really great live DVD and a very nice document of the band. With this DVD out on the market, the band will surely be remembered in the future! 1. A Tab In The Ocean (15:53) 2. Dream Nebula / Desolation Valley / Waves (14:03) 3. Remember The Future Part 1 (16:16) 4. Remember The Future Part 2 (19:56) 5. Cast Your Fate (4:57) 6. The Debate (7:52) 7. Cryin' In The Dark / King Of Twilight (12:16) 8. That's Life (6:00) 9. Show Me The Way (6:25) 10. A Day In The Life Of A Preacher / Squeeze / Mr. H (13:11) 11. Recycled (18:33) 12. Good Day (6:09) 13. Fidgety Queen (8:28)
title: Nektar ‎– Pure - Live In Germany
